Package org.spongepowered.api.tag

Interface TagTemplate<T extends Taggable<T>>

All Superinterfaces:
DataPackEntry<TagTemplate<T>>, DataSerializable, Keyed, ResourceKeyed
public interface TagTemplate<T extends Taggable<T>> extends DataPackEntry<TagTemplate<T>>
A template that creates a or modifies a Tag.
